description: Try our easy to follow Easy Pan-Fried Pork Steaks With Sauerkraut & Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork dishes,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Wheat free,Pork,Spring,Low sugar,Dinner Made Easy,Sesame free
name: Easy Pan-Fried Pork Steaks With Sauerkraut & Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat mash according to packet instructions.

Meanwhile, heat 1 tbs extra virgin oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook pork, in 2 batches, for 1 minute on each side or until just cooked through. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm.
Reduce heat to medium. Add sauerkraut and cook, stirring, for 4 minutes or until heated through.
Divide mash among plates. Top with sauerkraut and pork. Season and serve with apple sauce.
